articles.title: China's Israel envoy compares virus travel bans to Holocaust

articles.content:
Millions of Jewish were killed, and many, many Jewish were refused when they tried to seek assistance from other countries. Only very, very few countries opened their door, and among them is China, Dai said.

articles.title: Kimchi, cow poop and other spurious coronavirus remedies
articles.description: The lack of cure for the virus has spawned lots of kooky suggestions for treatment.

articles.author: Jeff Stein
articles.title: Trump team studies coronavirus impact on U.S. economy.
articles.description: The White House National Economic Council and the Council of Economic Advisers are jointly assessing both the potential short-term and long-term effects.
articles.content: Administration officials stressed that the work was preliminary and precautionary. While global markets slid Friday, White House economists only see a limited economic impact from the virus on the first quarter of 2020 of about 20 basis points, or 0.2 percent… [+2313 chars]

articles.title: China's coronavirus infections predicted to grow exponentially as fatality announced in Philippines
articles.description: The number of infections in China now stands at nearly 14,400 and 304 people have died.
articles.content:
There are almost 14,400 confirmed cases of coronavirus in China, including 10 on the self-governing island of Taiwan, with more than 300 dead. A new study says as many as 75,815 people in Wuhan may have been infected.

articles.title: Fears of new virus trigger anti-China sentiment worldwide
articles.description: As fears of a new coronavirus from China spread around the world, many countries are seeing rising anti-Chinese sentiment, calls for a full travel ban on Chinese and even public aversion to those from the epicenter of the outbreak
articles.content:
Two dozen countries outside of China have reported cases of the new coronavirus, which has killed more than 300 people and sickened thousands of others in China. Many countries have sent planes to the Chinese city of Wuhan to evacuate their nationals.
